org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry

Class MemCacheTicketRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.AbstractTicketRegistry
      • org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.MemCacheTicketRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TicketRegistry, TicketRegistryState, org.quartz.Job, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean

    @Component(value="memcachedTicketRegistry")
public final class MemCacheTicketRegistry
extends AbstractTicketRegistry
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean
    Key-value ticket registry implementation that stores tickets in memcached keyed on the ticket ID.
    Since:
    3.3

      • Fields inherited from class org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.AbstractTicketRegistry

    • Constructor Detail

      • MemCacheTicketRegistry

        public MemCacheTicketRegistry()
        Instantiates a new Mem cache ticket registry.

      • MemCacheTicketRegistry

        @Autowired
public MemCacheTicketRegistry(@Value(value="${memcached.servers:}")
                                         java.lang.String[] hostnames,
                                         @Value(value="${tgt.maxTimeToLiveInSeconds:28800}")
                                         int ticketGrantingTicketTimeOut,
                                         @Value(value="${st.timeToKillInSeconds:10}")
                                         int serviceTicketTimeOut)
        Creates a new instance that stores tickets in the given memcached hosts.
        Parameters:
        hostnames - Array of memcached hosts where each element is of the form host:port.
        ticketGrantingTicketTimeOut - TGT timeout in seconds.
        serviceTicketTimeOut - ST timeout in seconds.

      • MemCacheTicketRegistry

        public MemCacheTicketRegistry(net.spy.memcached.MemcachedClientIF client,
                              int ticketGrantingTicketTimeOut,
                              int serviceTicketTimeOut)
        Creates a new instance using the given memcached client instance, which is presumably configured via net.spy.memcached.spring.MemcachedClientFactoryBean.
        Parameters:
        client - Memcached client.
        ticketGrantingTicketTimeOut - TGT timeout in seconds.
        serviceTicketTimeOut - ST timeout in seconds.

      • getTickets

        public java.util.Collection<Ticket> getTickets()
        Retrieve all tickets from the registry. This operation is not supported.
        Specified by:
        getTickets in interface TicketRegistry
        Returns:
        collection of tickets currently stored in the registry. Tickets might or might not be valid i.e. expired.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if you try and call this operation.
